DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study observe effect caffeine overactive bladder symptom wellbeing . This study look whether caffeine bad effect urinary symptom low dos caffeine decrease effect . The study propose follow hypothesis : 1 . The void mental health symptom greatest high dose treatment low placebo treatment . 2 . The low dose treatment produce void mental health symptom placebo treatment . 3 . Voiding mental health symptom mediate hydration status patient assess use Tanita Scale .
DOC.brief_title: `` The Effects Caffeine Overactive Bladder Symptoms Mental Health Postmenopausal Women ''
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects expose 200 mg 400 mg caffeine pill placebo pill ( free caffeine ) . During treatment period , participant require avoid caffeine ( except caffeine within give treatment ) . The study stag 3 phase , last 7 day . After enrollment , participant ask refrain consuming substance contain caffeine 21 day treatment . Instead coffee caffeine item , expose caffeine pill form . Participants complete treatment random , cross blind fashion . One phase treatment participant consume two 200 mg-caffeine pill day ( total 400 mg caffeine/day ) , second treatment participant consume one 200 mg-caffeine pill one placebo pill day . And final treatment participant consume two placebo pill day . Treatment phase assign randomly participant . The participant know phase receiving . Prior treatment , participant ask fill detail diet log eat drink habit . Participants also ask series question survey related bladder symptom mental health periodically throughout study . It take 30 minute time answer questionnaire individual time point . During 21 day study period participant ask self-monitor fluid intake note major change fluid intake compare initial intake log . They ask conduct 24-hour voiding defecation log two different time point within treatment phase well prior study . 24-hour urine collect treatment phase two different time point well prior study . Participants weight lean body mass assess clinic use Tanita scale two time within treatment phase one time prior study
DOC.criteria: Low moderate coffee drinker ( 13 cups/day , 50450mg caffeine/d ) Able communicate read English 58 year age old Postmenopausal Excessive coffee drinker ( > 450 mg/d ) Individual regularly consume caffeine Uncontrolled hypertension Vaginal pain Chronic pelvic pain/ Interstitial cystitis Pre perimenopausal
